meanings.definition: A person of great importance or influence in a particular sphere.
meanings.sent1: In the world of fashion, the kingpins are the top designers who set the trends.
meanings.sent2: The kingpins of the company made all the major decisions.
meanings.sent3: At the chess tournament, the kingpins were the players with the most wins.
meanings.sent4: She saw herself as the kingpin of the neighborhood, always organizing events and gatherings.
meanings.sent5: The kingpins of the music industry have the power to launch new artists to stardom.

meanings.definition: A chief or principal person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The kingpins of the team led by example and motivated others to do their best.
meanings.sent2: The kingpins of the organization were responsible for overseeing all operations.
meanings.sent3: The kingpins of the playground were the kids who always had the best toys.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the towering trees stood like kingpins, dominating the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The kingpins of the kitchen were the pots and pans that were used every day.
